short_summary: PSPC has a requirement for the purchase of office furniture to Ottawa, ON, for delivery and installation by 2024-03-11.
description: This NPP covers a requirement amongst the PSIB Stream from product categories 1-2-5-3-6 and contains products that are Non-Supply Arrangement (NSA).
full_summary:
===============

# Tender Announcement

## Title

* English: EP076-240834 – Purchase Vision (PV) - Category 1, 2, 5, 3, and 6 - Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)
* French: EP076-240834 – Vision d'achat (VA) - Catégorie 1, 2, 5, 3 et 6 - SAEA

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4323949408-Doc4324226693
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4323949408
* **Tender Closing Date**: 18 December 2023, 14:00:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 29 December 2023

## Goods or Services Required

* The successful bidder will be required to supply office furniture in the National Capital Region (NCR) to the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC).
* The delivery and installation of the furniture are expected to be completed by 11 March 2024.

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (G/S)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Tender Status

* The tender is expired and no longer accepts submissions.

## Contact Information

* **Point of Contact:** Constantinos Tountas (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** [constantinos.tountas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:constantinos.tountas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Additional Information

* All inquiries and submissions should be directed to the point of contact.
* The full tender notice can be accessed via [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18104932?extsite=MTgxMDQ5MzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18104932?extsite=MTgxMDQ5MzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) . RHS_rhs_rhs
